price: 29. Waarlijk! Degene die (Tijdens het wereldse leven) lachten om de gelovigen.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أَجۡرَمُواْ كَانُواْ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna ajramū kānū mina alladhīna āmanū yaḍḥakūna
